title: The Army of the Night
description: France, 1813. Napoleon’s army must retreat from Spain, but the main pass across the jagged spine of the Pyrenees is within easy reach of the British forces. Searching for an alternative escape route, Alaine Bellanger discovers more than just an ancient mountain trail. Hidden between two peaks, he finds a secret refuge — and men who will risk everything to preserve it.(File under War; Werewolves; 'What If... ?')
author: Paul  Collis
